instructions:
Preheat oven to 350 F and grease with margarine and flour dust a 9 by 13-inch baking pan. Prepare spice
cake batter according to mix directions except: substitute 1 cup apple sauce for 1 cup of liquid in the
directions. Add baking soda and nuts to the batter. When cool frost with caramel icing. 
*(Rev. 5/22/00)*
ingredients: 1 box Duncan Hines spice cake mix
name: Apple Sauce Spice Cake
